chunks.title: Send Tokens - Complete Guide
chunks.body: Complete guide for sending tokens (cryptocurrencies) using NYLAGo. When users ask 'How do I send tokens?' they want to transfer cryptocurrency to another person using NYLAGo interface.
chunks.summary_en: Step-by-step instructions for sending tokens/cryptocurrency using NYLAGo interface through X.com integration.
chunks.summary_zh: 使用NYLAGo界面通过X.com集成发送代币/加密货币的分步说明。

steps.details: Launch NYLAGo either through the browser extension or visit https://sonyschan.github.io/nyla-go/ in your web browser. NYLAGo is your interface for creating cryptocurrency transfer commands.

In NYLAGo interface, locate and click the 'Send' tab. This is where you create transfer commands to send tokens to other people. The Send tab contains form fields for recipient, amount, and network selection.

Type the recipient's X.com (Twitter) username in the recipient field. Important: Enter ONLY the username without the @ symbol. For example, if sending to @alice, just type 'alice'. This username-based system makes transfers much easier than using long wallet addresses.

Enter the exact amount of tokens you want to send in the amount field. Then select the token type from the dropdown (SOL for Solana, ETH for Ethereum, ALGO for Algorand, etc.). Double-check the amount is correct before proceeding.

Choose the blockchain network that matches your token type. CRITICAL: Network must match token (SOL=Solana, ETH=Ethereum, ALGO=Algorand). Cross-chain transfers are NOT supported - you can only send within the same network.

Click the 'Send to X.com' or 'Generate Command' button to create your transfer command. NYLAGo will generate a specially formatted command that NYLA can understand and execute. This command contains all your transfer details in a secure format.

steps.action: Copy and post command on X.com
steps.details: Copy the generated command to your clipboard, then go to X.com (Twitter) and create a new post. Paste the command exactly as generated - do not edit or modify it. Post the command publicly so NYLA can see and process it.

After posting your command, NYLA will automatically detect it and execute the transfer. NYLA will reply to your post with confirmation details including transaction hash and status. This usually takes 30-60 seconds depending on network congestion.

common_questions.question: How do I send tokens?
common_questions.answer: Use NYLAGo's Send tab to enter recipient username, amount, and network, then post the generated command on X.com.

common_questions.question: How to send cryptocurrency?
common_questions.answer: NYLAGo makes it easy: open Send tab, enter details, generate command, post on X.com for NYLA to execute.

common_questions.question: Transfer tokens step by step
common_questions.answer: 1) Open NYLAGo 2) Send tab 3) Enter username 4) Choose amount/token 5) Select network 6) Generate command 7) Post on X.com 8) Wait for confirmation.

common_questions.question: How do I transfer crypto?
common_questions.answer: Use NYLAGo interface to create transfer commands that NYLA executes when you post them on X.com.

pitfalls.solution: Always match network to token type. SOL=Solana, ETH=Ethereum, ALGO=Algorand.
Copy and paste command exactly as generated. Do not modify the text.
